as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

id.description: Resize handle id (unique within group); falls back to `useId` when not provided
id.description_zh: 调整大小句柄 ID()组内唯一）；如果未提供,则回退到 `useId`

hitAreaMargins.description: Allow this much margin when determining resizable handle hit detection
hitAreaMargins.description_zh: 在确定可调整大小的句柄命中检测时允许的边距

withHandle.description: Whether the handle should be rendered

events.name: dragging
events.description: Event handler called when dragging the handler.
events.description_zh: 拖动句柄时调用的事件处理程序.
